amendment.description: An amendment numbered 66 printed in House Report 115-297 to prohibit funds from being used to implement, administer, or enforce the rule entitled "National Ambient Air Quality Standards for Ozone" published by the Environmental Protection Agency in the Federal Register on October 26, 2015.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A091) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A091) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A091) offered by Mr. Grothman.
